explanation: Multiple participants expressed bullish sentiment and anticipation of a BTC pump, mentioning large buy flows, all-time high targets, and bullish funding rates. Several users mentioned adding to longs or expecting BTC to go up, and there was a general consensus that the market is bullish with little mention of downside risk in the near-term. Contrarian short calls were quickly dismissed or challenged by other participants.
representative_opinions: "LORD UZI: millions of dollars have been invested into the market to pump this time btc is going to break the all time high"
"Neev: agree ruslanas i might add to my long"
"Solidity Monster: why would anyone short right now? Silly comment."
"Ferhaan Schmidt: you can short now gys"
"khilmi mubarok: still hold Sell until demand zone"
